item.title: Static Site Generators
item.description: This is the third iteration of my blog. In the past I had built it with Jekyll and Pelican but didn’t end up liking any of them. This time I am using Hugo, a open-source static site generators created using go and plan to stay with it. So far, I like Hugo because it is faster then Jekyll and pelican. Also, the Hugo CLI is very efficient and has good offical documentation.
